name: EP-SMWIN1_ADD
action: [IF]([AND]([EQ](<*VALUE(ARO_System_Required)*>,Yes),[EQ](<*VALUE(RESS_System_Required)*>,Yes))){<* DoNotResetAtt *><*SELECTVALUE(ARO_Sys_Grp_Part_Summary:EP-SMWIN1)*><*SETATVQTY(ARO_Sys_Grp_Part_Summary:EP-SMWIN1, <*Eval(<*VALUE(ARO_Stations_require_Multiwindow_support)*>+<*VALUE(RESS_Stations_require_Multiwindow_support)*>) *>.)*><* DoResetAtt *>}{[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(ARO_System_Required)*>,Yes)){<* DoNotResetAtt *><*SELECTVALUE(ARO_Sys_Grp_Part_Summary:EP-SMWIN1)*><*SETATVQTY(ARO_Sys_Grp_Part_Summary:EP-SMWIN1, <*Eval(<*VALUE(ARO_Stations_require_Multiwindow_support)*>) *>.)*><* DoResetAtt *>}{[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(RESS_System_Required)*>,Yes)){<* DoNotResetAtt *><*SELECTVALUE(ARO_Sys_Grp_Part_Summary:EP-SMWIN1)*><*SETATVQTY(ARO_Sys_Grp_Part_Summary:EP-SMWIN1, <*Eval(<*VALUE(RESS_Stations_require_Multiwindow_support)*>) *>.)*><* DoResetAtt *>}{0}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]
